alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 09 at 1:53PM EST until March 13 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR A POTENTIAL DAM FAILURE IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 PM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Flooding may occur from the potential failure of the Silver Crystal Dam. * WHERE...A portion of NORTH CENTRAL Kentucky, including a small portion of the following county, Jefferson. * WHEN...Until 130 PM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding possible along Wilson Creek, including portions of South Park Road, Farmers Lane, and Hornback Lane. Railroad tracks along Wilson Creek will also likely flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 136 PM EST, Jefferson County Emergency Management in coordination with engineers reported that dam failure could occur on the Silver Crystal Dam. If the dam does begin to fail, then a Flash Flood Warning will be issued. - Areas downstream of the dam along Wilson Creek, including South Park Road, Farmers Lane, and Hornback Road are the most likely areas that could experience flooding if the dam fails. Railroad tracks running parallel to South Park Road are also likely to flood. Use caution if in the area, and be prepared to act quickly should the dam fail. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... areas just east of Fairdale. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads. Stay away or be swept away. Do not try to drive across flooded roadways.
